translated: What are the four? They are: not going to the destinations of those who are not free, except in order to develop living beings; not going to the destinations of those in buddha-fields where there are no buddhas; not going to the destinations of those who are born in families that hold extremist views; and not going to any of the destinations of the lower realms.‚ÄùüîΩThus, the merit of the previously given gift should be protected from being taken away by the power of the reactive emotions.
